note.original: bhikkhu papatāya (syā. kaṃ.), bhikkhu viddho papatāya (?)
note.previous: Luddoti kho, bhikkhave, mārassetaṃ pāpimato adhivacanaṃ. Papatāti kho, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasilokassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Suttakanti kho, bhikkhave, nandirāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ assādeti nikāmeti – ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu giddho papatāya
viharati…pe… dāruṇo, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko…pe… adhigamāya. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dīghalomikā eḷakā kaṇṭakagahanaṃ paviseyya. Sā tatra tatra sajjeyya, tatra tatra gayheyya

note.original: upari tatiyavagge tatiyacatutthasuttesu ‘‘mā ca kho tvaṃ tāta sekhaṃ… anupāpuṇātū’’ti āgataṃ. tena nayena idhāpi attho gahetabbo. ettha hi kiṃ saddena paṭikkhepatthopi sakkā ñātuṃ, yathā ‘‘sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyya’’nti. tasmā kaṃ… āgacchatūti ettha kamapi… mā āgacchatūti ca, kaṃ sekhaṃ… anupāpuṇātūti ettha kamapi sekhaṃ… mā pāpuṇātūti ca attho veditabbo. aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca ayamevattho ñāpito

upari tatiyavagge tariyacatutthasuttesu ‘‘mā ca kho tvaṃ tāta sekhaṃ… anupāpuṇātū’’ti āgataṃ. tena nayena idhāpi attho gahetabbo. ettha hi kiṃ saddena paṭikkhepatthopi sakkā ñātuṃ, yathā ‘‘sayaṃ abhiññāya kamuddiseyya’’nti. tasmā kaṃ… āgacchatūti ettha kamapi… mā āgacchatūtica, taṃ sekhaṃ… anupāpuṇātūti ettha kamapi sekhaṃ… mā pāpuṇātūti ca attho veditabbo. aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu ca ayamevattho ñāpito
asanivicakkaṃ, taṃ sekhaṃ (pī. ka.), asanivicakkaṃ, sekhaṃ (syā. kaṃ.), asanivicakkaṃ āgacchatu, kaṃ sekhaṃ (?)
diṭṭhigatena visallena (ka. sī.), diṭṭhigatena sallena (syā. kaṃ.), diṭṭhigatena visallena sallena (ka.), diṭṭhagatena visallena sallena (pī.)
note.previous: , bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko…pe… adhigamāya. Kaṃ, bhikkhave, diddhagatena visallena sallena

note.original: vijjhatu, taṃ sekhaṃ (sī.), vijjhati, taṃ sekhaṃ (pī. ka.)

note.previous: vassamānassā’’ti? Evaṃ, bhante’’. Eso kho, bhikkhave, jarasiṅgālo ukkaṇḍakena
Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati…pe… dāruṇo, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko…pe… adhigamāya. Upari, bhikkhave, ākāse verambhā

note.original: appamādavihārino (pī. ka.) appamāṇoti hettha phalasamādhi, na sati

note.previous: Sāvatthiyaṃ viharati…pe… dāruṇo, bhikkhave, lābhasakkārasiloko…pe… saddhā bhikkhave upāsikā ekaṃ dhītaraṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ evaṃ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya – ‘tādisā, ayye, bhavāhi yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā
